text:
Use of resources for the year ending with 31st March 2005
	The use of resources for the service of the year ending with 31st March 2005is authorised to the amount of £6,742,891,000.
Issue out of the Consolidated Fund for the year ending with 31st March2005
	The Treasury may issue out of the Consolidated Fund of the United Kingdom andapply to the service of the year ending with 31st March 2005 the sum of£7,621,925,000.
Use of resources for the year ending with 31st March 2006
	The use of resources for the service of the year ending with 31st March 2006is authorised to the amount of £158,080,667,000.
Issue out of the Consolidated Fund for the year ending with 31st March2006
	The Treasury may issue out of the Consolidated Fund of the United Kingdom andapply to the service of the year ending with 31st March 2006 the sum of£149,539,608,000.
Short title
	This Act may be cited as the Consolidated Fund (No. 2) Act 2004.
